title: Rerun a Lab Test
description: A lab result is questionable or inconsistent with the patient's clinical picture. A lab supervisor decides to rerun the test.

tasks.description: Locate the original test result in the LIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor finds the result that needs to be re-tested.

tasks.description: Add a new order for the same test on the existing specimen.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new order is created to track the rerun.

tasks.description: Process the specimen again and enter the new result, which will be marked as a corrected result.
tasks.expected_outcome: The test is rerun, and the new, accurate result replaces the old one, with a full audit trail.
